name: Teslimat Tarihi Bazlı Satış Sipariş Analizi
query:
SELECT
    so.name AS "Sales Order:Link/Sales Order:275",
    soi.item_code AS "Item Code:Link/Item:120",
    so.customer AS "Customer:Link/Customer:120",
    soi.delivery_date AS "Delivery Date:Date:150",
    (soi.qty - soi.delivered_qty) AS "Pending Qty:Float:140",
    soi.delivered_qty AS "Delivered Qty:Float:140",
    soi.qty AS "Qty:Float:140",
    so.status AS "Sales Order Status::150",
    so.po_no AS "Customer PO No::150",
    CONCAT('KW', LPAD(WEEK(soi.delivery_date,1), 2, '0'), ' ', YEAR(soi.delivery_date)) AS "Delivery Week::110",
    DATE_FORMAT(soi.delivery_date, '%%Y-%%m') AS "Delivery Month::100",
    soi.item_name AS "Item Name::150",
    soi.base_amount AS "Base Amount:Currency:100",
    soi.billed_amt AS "Billed Amount:Currency:100",
    soi.warehouse AS "Warehouse:Link/Warehouse:130",
    so.transaction_date AS "Sales Order Transaction Date:Date:100",
    c.customer_group AS "Customer Group::120",
    i.item_group AS "Item Group::120",


    -- İlgili sevk irsaliyesi bilgileri
    dni.parent AS "Delivery Note:Link/Delivery Note:160",
    dn.posting_date AS "Delivery Note Date:Date:130",
    dn.status AS "Delivery Note Status::150",
    dni.qty AS "Delivered Qty (Per DN):Float:130"

FROM
    `tabSales Order Item` soi
JOIN
    `tabSales Order` so ON soi.parent = so.name

LEFT JOIN `tabDelivery Note Item` dni ON dni.so_detail = soi.name
LEFT JOIN `tabDelivery Note` dn ON dn.name = dni.parent
LEFT JOIN `tabCustomer` c ON so.customer = c.name
LEFT JOIN `tabItem` i ON soi.item_code = i.name


WHERE
    so.docstatus = 1
    AND soi.delivery_date IS NOT NULL
    AND (dn.status IS NULL OR dn.status <> 'Cancelled')

ORDER BY
    soi.delivery_date ASC
report_name: Teslimat Tarihi Bazlı Satış Sipariş Analizi
